description: The deputy for St Peter Port South had served in the States since 2008.
title: Guernsey Deputy Jan Kuttelwascher dies
title_page: Guernsey Deputy Jan Kuttelwascher dies - BBC News
maintext: Mr Kuttelwascher was a long-time campaigner for increasing the length of Guernsey's runway to allow larger or more heavily laden planes to land, to encourage more airlines to operate from the island.
